prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Pipe, Guitar, Drums, Piano, Strings, Bass, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Pipe, Guitar, Drums, Piano, Strings, and Bass are all featured in this song, but Brass is absent.

Style 2: This composition is comprised of Reed, Pipe, Guitar, Drums, Piano, Strings, and Bass, but Brass is not included.

Style 3: This piece of music has Reed, Pipe, Guitar, Drums, Piano, Strings, and Bass, omitting Brass.
